## How to mark attendance status for learners?

Emily is a trainer in an organisation and the “Quality Systems” session for
"Class A" in the course "Certified Quality Engineer" has been assigned to her.
The session will start soon, and Emily would like to start marking attendance
status for learners.

Let’s see how Emily will mark attendance status in Curricula.

1\. In Curricula, Emily clicks **Course** on the left navigation pane.

2\. She finds the card for "Certified Quality Engineer" and clicks "Class A"
to access the **Class details** page. She can see all sessions of the course.

3\. Emily clicks "Quality Systems" to view all learning activities that
learners need to complete in the session.

4\. She clicks the Mark attendance button in the upper-right corner.

5\. On the **Mark attendance** page, Emily can see all learners enrolled to
"Class A". She selects the attendance status for each learner, and she can
also add comments for a learner. The attendance status and comments are
automatically saved.
